description: This beautiful three-bedroom home is nestled within Villanova, a family-friendly gated community located in one of Dubai's suburban areas. This villa is located close to the community entrance, it is a brand new unit that is ready to move in. It sits on a single row, giving you more space and privacy than a back-to-back unit would. The main living area is open plan the kitchen is semi open and fully fitted out. There are three principal bedrooms plus a maid's room - all are with built-in storage. The home also benefits from a well-sized backyard that is ideal for children to play in. Designed to offer the best in family living, Villanova offers a fine selection of amenities for its residents. Fitness and nature lovers will appreciate the abundance of parks, along with outdoor sports facilities, leisure areas and playgrounds in the area. There is also an upcoming  community centre which will consist of a supermarket, pharmacy, hair salon and other retail options. Shopping malls are also located nearby, and only a short drive will take you to the City Land Mall, 25 minutes to the Dubai Mall and upcming Dubai Hills Mall. Please contact me today to arrange a viewing.

description: AZCO REAL ESTATE BROKERS LLC is excited to bring you this "faithful to local modern design traditions", lateral apartments with a delightful spacious terrace view that is going to improve your lifestyle. Clever and discerning, cheerful residents can live the life they choose from here. Roy Mediterranean is a residential building in Al Furjan. The tower features ten floors with a total of 271 serviced residential units. These are divided into 224 studio and 47 1-bedroom flats. The project was launched by Azizi Developments in 2016 and completed in 2018. The amenities in the building include gymnasium, swimming pool, spa, kids’ play area, retail outlets and a podium level café. Al Furjan is a vibrant neighbourhood of Dubai offering apartments, villas and townhouses with modern amenities. It has two community centres – Al Furjan Pavilion and Al Furjan West Pavilion, featuring shops, sports court, gym and mosque. Al Furjan is located close to Discovery Gardens and The Greens.
